titles.title: 579 God In The Gospel Of His Son (familiar easy tu

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God in the gospel
Of His Son
Makes His eternal
Counsels known
Where love in all
Its glory shines
And truth is drawn
In fairest lines

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Here sinners of
A humble frame
May taste His grace
And learn His name
May read in characters
Of blood
The wisdom pow'r
and grace of God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The pris'ner here may
Break his chains
The weary
Rest from all his pains
The captive feel
His bondage cease
The mourner find
The way of peace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Here faith reveals
To mortal eyes
A brighter world
Beyond the skies
Here shines the light
Which guides our way
From earth
To realms of endless day

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
O grant us grace
Almighty Lord
To read and mark
Thy holy Word
Its truths with meekness
To receive
And by its
holy precepts live
